meanings.definition: A flat, thin piece of material
meanings.sent1: She placed the plant on the planches to keep it off the ground.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used planches to build the new bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to balance on the planches, pretending to be a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: The planches of ice on the lake cracked under the weight of the skater.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully selected the planches of wood for his sculpture.

meanings.definition: A stage or platform for a performance
meanings.sent1: The actors gathered nervously behind the planches before the play started.
meanings.sent2: The singer stood confidently on the brightly lit planches during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The planches creaked loudly as the magician made them disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: The planches of the stage seemed to hold the magic of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The dancers gracefully moved across the planches, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: A board used in printing or engraving
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully carved the design into the planches for the print.
meanings.sent2: The printer loaded the planches with ink to create the final image.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran off with one of the planches, mistaking it for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The planches held the key to transferring the intricate design onto paper.
meanings.sent5: The engraver skillfully etched the intricate pattern onto the planches.
